name: Rotato Cube
description:
Rotato Cube is a simple but competitive game where you must avoid hundreds of different obstacles while rotating around a cube to be able to explore multiple different environments, going from the relaxing calmness of nature to a mysterious mythical place.

Try to reach the furthest and check how well you've made with the social and global leaderboards.

Collect gems to customize your character with multiple skins and colors!

Complete multiple daily quests and achievements to help you get the skin you want!

Experience all the different zones with amazing matching music tracks.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rotatocube/
Discord: https://discord.gg/jdtkDFZ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RotatoCube
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rotatocube/
